title: Ticket #4186: Remove DAGMAN_USE_OLD_DAG_READER config knob
description: As per TJ's code review for #4171, I'm going to create a DAGMAN_USE_OLD_DAG_READER config knob. This is something that we don't want to be permanent. So this ticket is a reminder to remove it (probably in 8.1.5) once we're sure that there aren't any problems with the new code in condor_submit_dag.
remarks:
Pushing this back a little, so we can run 8.3.0 and 8.3.1 with the new code before tearing out the old code.

2015-Jan-13 11:33:19 by wenger:
This is committed, and I'm going to assign it to Zach for retroactive review.

2015-Sep-22 11:43:01 by wenger:
I'm going to resolve this since it's been in the code base for half a year...
